1. space a over c plus b over c equals fraction numerator a plus b over denominator c end fraction
2. space a over c minus b over c equals fraction numerator a minus b over denominator c end fraction
3. space a over b plus c over d equals fraction numerator a d plus b c over denominator b d end fraction
4. space a over b minus c over d equals fraction numerator a d minus b c over denominator b d end fraction
